address_validation.send_address: Addresses can only start TZ1, TZ2, TZ3 or KT1
address_validation.delegate_address: You can only delegate to TZ1, TZ2 or TZ3 addresses.
address_validation.special_chars: Addresses cannot contain any special characters.
address_validation.send_funds: You cannot send funds to yourself.

delegate.title: Setting a Delegate
delegate.content1: You can always change the delegate at a later time.
delegate.content2: There is a fee for changing the delegate.
delegate.content3: You can only delegate to the Manager Address. The Manager Address always starts with 'tz1'.
